thread.title: MBASolutions

author: MBASolutions
title: MBASolutions
text:
After reading some of the online reviews, I decided to contact RapidAdvance for a small business loan that was to be used on a small expansion project. I spoke with Cameron who all but assured me that they would be able to assist. After taking my information, I got one email asking for additional information which I provided. I then contacted him to followup and was told that they would not be able to do anything for me at this time. So now, I have a hard inquiry on my credit score which I take very seriously. Please be very careful when dealing with this company. I wouldn't recommend their lending services to anyone.
M.L., MBA
